name: The Fight for Fish: A Billder's Revolution
name_original: The Fight for Fish: A Billder's Revolution
description:
Play as Flip, Flap, Bill, and Jill: penguins who are hungry and need fish to live. Take the enemy fish and bring it back to your own base. Take out the other penguins with your snowball launcher and build blocks to defend against others.

XBox controls:

Left Stick to move

Right Stick to aim

Left Trigger to build

Right Trigger to shoot

A to jump

B to dash

Dpad to taunt

Requires 4 XBox controllers to play.
